definitions.text: put up with something or somebody unpleasant
examples: I cannot bear his constant criticism
The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks
he learned to tolerate the heat
She stuck out two years in a miserable marriage

definitions.text: continue to live through hardship or adversity
examples: We went without water and food for 3 days
These superstitions survive in the backwaters of America
The race car driver lived through several very serious accidents
how long can a person last without food and water?
This dress wore well for almost ten years

definitions.text: persist for a specified period of time
examples: The bad weather lasted for three days
